projects.name: NamasteUI
projects.description: A sleek component library built on Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript. Elevate your web projects with responsive navbar, grid, carousel, etc. more designed for seamless integration and enhanced user experiences.

projects.name: Evently
projects.description: Evently is a robust event management platform featuring secure event management with CRUD operations, related event connections, dynamic categorization, Stripe payments, and streamlined order management.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Crafted using components from Magic UI, leveraging the power of Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and other innovative technologies.

projects.name: Deluxe Dhaba
projects.description: Discover Deluxe Dhaba: Where timeless Indian flavors blend seamlessly with contemporary dining, crafted with care in every dish. Experience authentic tastes and warm hospitality in every visit.
